contents.text: Hello, and thank you for calling Mynd East Bay, where modern property management brings you peace of Mynd.
For resident and leasing support, press 1.
To apply for a rental or schedule a tour, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a leasing specialist.

navigationGoals: Arrange a tour of an available one-bedroom apartment this Friday and get leasing details
I need to schedule a tour of an available unit and ask about veteran leasing incentives.
I want to apply for a lease and schedule a virtual property tour.
I need help applying for a rental and scheduling a tour of a one-bedroom apartment.
I’d like to schedule a tour and submit an application for the two-bedroom unit near campus.

contents.text: To pay rent or submit a maintenance request, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to resident services.

navigationGoals: Submit a maintenance request for my apartment’s broken air conditioner
I want to submit a maintenance request for my apartment’s heating system and discuss a rent deferral until my VA benefits arrive.
I need to process my rent payment for this month through the portal.
I need to request maintenance to fix the heater in my apartment.
I need to file a maintenance request for a leaking sink in my apartment.

contents.text: For owner services and property insights, press 2.
For performance reports and financial statements, press 1.
Please hold while we retrieve your owner reports.

navigationGoals: Obtain the latest quarterly financial statement and occupancy report for my investment property
I’m looking to retrieve the latest performance report and financial statement for my investment property.
I'd like to download the Q2 performance metrics and P&L statement for my property.
I’d like to receive the latest financial and performance report for my property.
I’m calling to download the latest quarterly performance report and financial statement for my rental property.

contents.text: To speak with your property manager, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to your property manager.

navigationGoals: Speak with my property manager about upcoming lease renewals and rent adjustments
Please connect me to my property manager to discuss tenant issues and inspection scheduling.
I’d like to connect with my dedicated property manager for a consultation.
I need to speak with my property manager about an issue with my tenant.
I want to speak directly with my property manager about coordinating a move-out inspection.
